title: wood_fired_cooking_daily_meal
summary: Preparation of a simple daily meal using a wood-fired stove, optimizing limited resources through shared ingredients.
description: This record documents the preparation of a household meal at MaMeeFarm using a traditional wood-fired stove. The dish consists of stir-fried cucumber with pork sausage. The sausage was purchased for 49 THB and portioned across five meals, demonstrating resource efficiency, cost-conscious living, and everyday food security practices within a small-scale farm context.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
